name: TheMiniCount2
description:
In ten challenging levels, 

you'll play with dwindling time, 

Press "START," the countdown begins, 

and at zero, "STOP" you must chime.

If you manage to halt in the middle, 

you advance with pride and no fright, 

with each level, the task hardens, 

the screen wavers, making it a tougher fight.

At the end, your score awaits, 

your true skill and dexterity revealed,

with "Play Again" you can restart, 

and in this game, once more, shine unsealed.
